title: New: Blooms â€“ Lust
content:
Now on her third track, Irish songstress Blooms is beginning to truly make a name for herself, with her wistful, deeply sensual, R&B inspired tracks.

New cut, Lust, is the most seductive so far, again featuring production from Sacred Animals, and making the most of her fantastic vocal delivery.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
